name: MultiMino 2: Polyform Replay File
summary: Learn about .RM2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When a user opens an RM2 file in MultiMino 2, they can watch past matches as if they were happening in real time. The replay file makes it helpful in reviewing strategies, studying opponents' gameplay, or sharing highlights with other players.
NOTE: Since RM2 files only contain gameplay data, they are generally small in size compared to video recordings.

instructions: You can open RM2 files with Stellar Top Hat MultiMino 2: Polyform. To do this, place the file in the game's replay directory (if required by the version you are using) or select it directly from the in-game replay menu. Once loaded, the game will play back the recorded match exactly as it happened.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
